definitions.definition: A person's daughter or son ; a person's child .
Any of a person's descendants , including of further generations.
An animal or plant's progeny or young .
Anything produced ; the result of an entity's efforts.
examples: Artists often treasure their works as their immortal offspring .

definitions.definition: A process launched by another process.

main_definition: A person's daughter or son ; a person's child .
secondary_definitions: Any of a person's descendants , including of further generations.
An animal or plant's progeny or young .
( figuratively ) Anything produced ; the result of an entity's efforts.
( computing ) A process launched by another process.
